description.value: A strong fishing rod, fully featured with a silk line, a steel hook and sinker, and a custom bobber.  You can use a Rest Action and expend 1 Fishing Bait to catch a single unexceptional fish with a successful DC 15 Wisdom (Instinct) Check. This fish can be cooked to feed a single creature.  When used with the Fishing Trade, it has a base fishing score of 2.
